Claim: "A blond woman has a tattoo of an angel on her arm."
Implication: "A person with a tattoo walks down the street."
Referring expressions: Blond woman, tattoo of an angel, her arm.  A person, tattoo, street
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsBlond(a) and HasTattooOfAnAngel(b) and IsOnHerArm(c))))) -> (exists f (exists e (exists d (IsWithTattoo(d) and WalksDownTheStreet(e,f)))))
